item.description:
Showtime is at 7:15PM.  I will be at the theater by 6:15PM and we will be heading in for seats at 6:45PM. 

The movie is showing upstairs, so look for me at a table near the windows at the top of the escalators.  I will have on my Meetup Pin.

Remember it's opening weekend and Mark is a Boston Boy so it is a good idea to buy your tickets ahead of time.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after.  We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

If you are planning to attend the after event, please plan and bring cash.


Movie Details: 

Release Date: January 13, 2012
Studio: Universal Pictures
Director: Baltasar Kormákur
Screenwriter: Aaron Guzikowski
Starring: Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Ben Foster, Giovanni Ribisi, Caleb Landry Jones, Lukas Haas, Diego Luna, J.K. Simmons
Genre: Action, Thriller
MPAA Rating: R (for violence, pervasive language and brief drug use)
Official Website: Contrabandmovie.net | Facebook

Plot Summary: Mark Wahlberg leads the cast of "Contraband," a fast-paced thriller about a man trying to stay out of a world he worked so hard to leave behind and the family he'll do anything to protect. Set in New Orleans, the film explores the cutthroat underground world of international smuggling -- full of desperate criminals and corrupt officials, high-stakes and big payoffs -- where loyalty rarely exists and death is one wrong turn away.

Chris Farraday (Wahlberg) long ago abandoned his life of crime, but after his brother-in-law, Andy (Caleb Landry Jones), botches a drug deal for his ruthless boss, Tim Briggs (Giovanni Ribisi), Chris is forced back into doing what he does best--running contraband--to settle Andy's debt. Chris is a legendary smuggler and quickly assembles a crew with the help of his best friend, Sebastian (Ben Foster), to head to Panama and return with millions in counterfeit bills.

Things quickly fall apart and with only hours to reach the cash, Chris must use his rusty skills to successfully navigate a treacherous criminal network of brutal drug lords, cops and hit men before his wife, Kate (Kate Beckinsale), and sons become their target.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
